title: "Board Game Night - #13 - Happy Birthday Tatsuya"
---

<script async defer src="//platform.instagram.com/en_US/embeds.js"></script>
<p>It was Tatsuya's (AKA Jason) birthday, November 10th! We finally broke a new record of people at once, with 19 at one time. I hope we can keep growing more and more as a circle. Everyone is awesome!</p>
<p>この日はたつやくんの誕生日だった！そして、１９人で新記録を達成した！これから、このサークルの成長を楽しみにしているな！</p>
